texto: 5 Quantitative data and associated statistical techniques in ISO 9001 Quantitative data that can reasonably be encountered in activities associated with the clauses and subclauses of ISO 9001:2015 are noted in Table 1. Listed against the quantitative data identified are statistical techniques that can be of potential benefit to the organization when applied to such data. No statistical techniques have been identified where quantitative data cannot be readily associated with a clause or sub-clause of ISO 9001. The statistical techniques cited in this document are limited to those that are well known. A brief description of each of these statistical techniques is given in Clause 7. The
